data.content: (Kỹ thuật) biên mã, mã hóa

verb
-codes; -coded; -coding
[+ obj] to put (a message) into the form of a code so that it can kept secret :code
an encoded message - compare decode
to put information in the form of a code on (something)
Credit cards are encoded with cardholder information.
to change (information) into a set of letters, numbers, or symbols that can be read by a computer
a technology that encodes images/files
